main event: Two Navy pilots reported seeing a strange glowing light in the sky over San Diego on December 23, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped, silver in color, and very bright,The pilots saw the glowing light at an altitude of about 7,000 to 8,000 feet,The object was stationary at one point and did not show up on Air Force radar equipment,The object emitted no sound and left no trail or exhaust,The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes before the object increased in speed and disappeared to the south.
witness description: Navy pilots on a routine training flight
